for i in range(int(raw_input())):
	a = list(raw_input())
	b = list(raw_input())
	d = []
	summ = 0
	if len(list(set(a))) == 1:
		print "Unlucky Chef"
	else:
		c = 0
		for x in range(len(a)):
			if a[x] != b[x]:
				c = c + 1
				d.append(int(a[x]))
 
		l1 = d.count(1)
		l0 = d.count(0)
 
		if l1 >= l0:
			summ = len(d) - l0
 
		else:
			summ = len(d) - l1
 
 
		print "Lucky Chef"
		print summ
